definitions.definition: Something that motivates, rouses, or encourages.
definitions.example: I have no incentive to do housework right now.

definitions.definition: A bonus or reward, often monetary, to work harder.
definitions.example: Management offered the sales team a $500 incentive for each car sold.

definitions.definition: Inciting; encouraging or moving; rousing to action; stimulating.
Serving to kindle or set on fire.
